about.title: CBIT National Service Scheme
about.description: We, The NSS Club at Chaitanya Bharathi Institute of Technology (CBIT), Hyderabad, embody the spirit of selfless service and community engagement. Established in 2007, it has grown into a vibrant unit with over 250 student volunteers from undergraduate and postgraduate programs. The club actively organizes initiatives such as health camps, environmental awareness programs, cleanliness drives, and other social welfare activities. Its focus is on fostering a sense of social responsibility among students while addressing pressing societal and environmental issues.
